subject: [cc-devel] SoC Congratulations!
body:
Congratulations to all students accepted in soc program!Thank you all for the suggestions about my application, you will receive a regular feedback about it progress at TechBlog. I'm eager to begin the project and I'll do my best to fit your expectations.
Best regards,Cassio-- Cássio Melowww.cin.ufpe.br/~cam2/info/english+55 (81) 2126.8430 ext: 4015+55 (81) 9134.1950
